casebody.data:
Javier A. SALDANA, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF THE TREASURY, Respondent. No. 04-3091. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Oct. 12, 2004.

Before NEWMAN, Circuit Judge, ARCHER, Senior Circuit Judge, and DTK, Circuit Judge.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED: AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36
